title: Can North Korea be trusted with Nukes? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/3/17
itunes:title: Can North Korea be trusted with Nukes? - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 5/3/17
description:
George Noory and guest Dr. Herb London examine growing world tensions and how the United States should use international diplomacy to deal with the threat of North Korea using nuclear weapons.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
